column4: Hello I have installed emerald and I have downloaded some themes how can I use the theme now ?
yeah and, when I oik the theme what should I do then ?
I don't understand what you said.  "oik"?
I open emerald theme manager and import the theme, but what next I can't apply or something only close
if the theme was imported correctly, it will show up in the themes list.  selecting a theme from the themes list should change the active theme
if you installed it but haven't logged out and back in yet, it won't be started
I did that in alt - f2
use a terminal to see the output of "ps x | grep emerald"
I don't know what the issue is, then
